roleset.name: reject, decline, turn down
roleset.note: REJECT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reject' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'decline' and 'accept'. (from reject.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: He also rejected reports that his departure stemmed from disappointment the general manager's post hadn't also led to a board directorship at the London-based news organization.
example.arg: reports that his departure stemmed from disappointment the general manager's post hadn't also led to a board directorship at the London-based news organization

example.name: with attribute
example.text: Telerate's two independent directors have rejected the offer as inadequate.
